original_text: And our hope of you is stedfast, knowing, that as ye are partakers of the sufferings, so shall ye be also of the consolation.
korean_text: 너희를 위한 우리의 소망이 견고함은 너희가 고난에 참여하는 자가 된 것 같이 위로에도 그러할 줄을 앎이라

sentences.original_text: And our hope of you is stedfast
as ye are partakers of the sufferings
so shall ye be also of the consolation
